commands.description: Display dynamic real-time view of running system processes.
commands.usecase: Monitor CPU and memory usage for a specific user's processes
commands.author: William LeFebvre

commands.description: Report file system disk space usage.
commands.usecase: Check available disk space in human-readable format
commands.author: Torbjörn Granlund, David MacKenzie

commands.description: Display amount of free and used memory in the system.
commands.usecase: View RAM and swap usage in human-readable format
commands.author: Brian Edmonds

commands.description: Print system information including kernel version and architecture.
commands.author: David MacKenzie

commands.description: Show how long the system has been running and load averages.
commands.usecase: Check system uptime and current load
commands.author: Larry Greenfield, Michael Haardt

commands.description: Estimate file and directory space usage.
commands.usecase: Check size of all log directories in human-readable format
commands.author: Torbjörn Granlund, David MacKenzie
